channel.title: [317] Log In Screen (FullScreen Interface)
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I`m currently working on adding the old RuneScape login interface, and I don`t know how can I make it fullscreen. This is how does it looks: [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg600/scaled.php?server=600&filename=loginscreenz.png&res=medium[/img]
I want it to look like this one [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/5355/414loginscreen.png[/img] (Took this picture from Scully`s Project)
Any help?

item.title: [317] Log In Screen (FullScreen Interface)
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:412150”][quote author=I Roll Deep link=topic=513402.msg3727418#msg3727418 date=1314380239]
Hello everyone, Im currently working on adding the old RuneScape login interface, and I dont know how can I make it fullscreen.
This is how does it looks:

I want it to look like this one

(Took this picture from Scully`s Project)

Any help?
[/quote]

Perhaps you could ask Scully which how he got the fullscreen interface to show. However, I believe I told you how to accomplish this on a duplicate thread.[/quote]
Nope you didn’t :o

Read full topic
